casebody.data:
Elson FORD, Jr., Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
The OAKS ACADEMY and Elizabeth Hamilton, Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A04-1711-CT-2538 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED June 13, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

NAJAM , J.

Reversed and remanded for further proceedings.

ROBB, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
